meanings.definition: A narrow horizontal surface projecting from a wall or cliff.
meanings.sent1: The bird built its nest on the small ledge.
meanings.sent2: She carefully walked along the rocky ledge.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel performed a balancing act on the ledge.
meanings.sent4: The ledge jutted out like a diving board over the water.
meanings.sent5: The ledge provided a precarious perch for the adventurous climber.

meanings.definition: A list or register of names or items.
meanings.sent1: The teacher checked the class ledger for attendance.
meanings.sent2: He added his name to the ledger of volunteers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student tried to sneak a peek at the secret ledger.
meanings.sent4: The ledger of library books was meticulously maintained.
meanings.sent5: The ledger contained a record of all transactions.
